Missions.Full Rush: All players must hold the W key at all times.
Missions.Wall of china: All players must crouch boost and can only move while crouching.
Missions.Get down Mr. President: One player is the president and must be protected at all costs. All other players must follow the president and protect them. If the president dies, the round is lost (kill yourselves).
Missions.Oooh shiny: All players must inspect their gun before being allowed to fire.
Missions.MLG Clip farming: All players must jump and turn 360 degrees before being allowed to shoot.
Missions.Pussy mode: All players must hide in the same corner.
Missions.Pump it: All players must do a pushup every time they weapon needs reloading.
Missions.Martyrdom: When a player dies, they must make a very exagerated death noise for at least 5 seconds.
Missions.Double switcheroo: Players must tell the enemy team the site they will be going to and have to go to that site.
Missions.Blind bumrush: All players drop 2 flashes to one player on the team. The designated player must continuously flashes the way the rest of the team is taking.
Missions.Smoke carpet: All players must buy a smoke and create a tunnel through mid. Then they must run through it.
Missions.Butter fingers: All players must drop their gun every 10 seconds and get a different gun (can be the same type).
Missions.Tactical monkeys: All players must communicate as if they were a SWAT team.
Missions.Cleptomania: Every time a weapon/gadget is found on the ground, it must be picked up.
Missions.Prone to error: All players must give non-sensical callouts or lie, if somebody gives a real callout they must be executed.
Missions.Infamous Turk: All players must buy a Nova and rage at every opportunity they can.
Missions.Clear comms: All players must describe all their actions at all times.
Missions.Fuck Megaknight: All players must make noises as if they were in Clash Royale.
Missions.Low-budget dubbing: All players must mute their game volume and voice over the games noises.
Missions.Fire in the hole: All players must buy full utility and throw it as soon as they see an enemy.
Missions.Zappy assault: All players must buy a Zeus, if the player fails to get a Zeus kill, they must hit 10 squats.
Missions.Minute of silence: As soon as this prompt shows, all players must remain silent until the end of the round. If they fail to do so they must send in a slutty selfie in the groupchat.
